job_title: Front Desk Receptionist in Burnaby, BC

review_title: Worst company in the history of all kind.
pros: The ability to work and help ppl with development, mental disabilities and challenges including seniors in their respective communities.
cons: Sexist company, management full of hatred against minority men in specific. Some men I know of have contemplated suicide. When I told them I was leaving they fed lies to my ex coworkers that eventually became my besties. If your looking to get hated upon, beat, discriminated against this may be the place for you. FYI this company is unionized and the union member takes company side.

pros: You get to choose if you want to work on a specific day.
cons: Last minute call to fill a shift.

cons: It's a large organization, and it's hard to get to know other staff members if you're on a targeted project.
